alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lexington and northwestern Richland Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harbison State Forest, or over St. Andrews, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Forest Acres, Springdale, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Oak Grove, Arcadia Lakes, Columbia International University, Killian, Harbison State Forest, Riverbanks Zoo, Woodfield, Sesquicentennial State Park, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk and Fort Jackson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 57 and 78. Interstate 26 between mile markers 98 and 112. Interstate 77 between mile markers 8 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
